text: Herve Antchandie (born 24 September 2001) is a French born Gabonese tennis player. Antchandie has a career high ATP singles ranking of 1,425, achieved on 22 December 2014. He also has a career high ATP doubles ranking of 1,873, which was achieved on 16 September 2019. Antchandie has represented Gabon at Davis Cup, where he has a win-loss record of 1–2. ==Davis Cup== ===Participations: (1–2)=== {| |-valign=top | {|class=wikitable !Group membership |-bgcolor=#FFFFCC |World Group (0–0) |- style="background:#B0E0E6;" |WG Play-off (0–0) |-bgcolor=#CCFFCC |Group I (0–0) |-bgcolor=#FFCCFF |Group II (0–0) |-bgcolor=#99CCFF |Group III (0–0) |-bgcolor=#FFCC99 |Group IV (1–2) |} | {|class=wikitable !Matches by surface |- |Hard (1–2) |- |Clay (0–0) |- |Grass (0–0) |- |Carpet (0–0) |} | {|class=wikitable |- !Matches by type |- |Singles (0–1) |- |Doubles (1–1) |} |} * indicates the outcome of the Davis Cup match followed by the score, date, place of event, the zonal classification and its phase, and the court surface. {|class=wikitable !Rubber outcome !No. !Rubber !Match type (partner if any) !Opponent nation !Opponent player(s) !Score |- !colspan=7|0–3; 26 June 2019; Complexe Sportif Concorde de Kintele, Brazzaville, Congo; Europe/Africa Zone Group IV Round Robin; Hard surface |-bgcolor=#FFCC99 |bgcolor=FFA07A|Defeat |1 |III |Doubles (with Lyold Obiang Ondo) | Ghana |Isaac Nortey / Benjamin Palm |6–2, 6–7(1–7), 6–7(4–7) |- !colspan=7|1–2; 27 June 2019; Complexe Sportif Concorde de Kintele, Brazzaville, Congo; Europe/Africa Zone Group IV Round Robin; Hard surface |-bgcolor=#FFCC99 |bgcolor=FFA07A|Defeat |2 |II |Singles |rowspan=2| Cameroon |Nkwenti Ngwohoh |3–6, 4–6 |-bgcolor=#FFCC99 |bgcolor=98FB98|Victory |3 |III |Doubles (with Wilfrid Lebendje) |Dieu Ne Dort Midzie / Etienne Teboh |6–3, 7–5 |} ==References== == External links == * * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Gabonese sportsmen Category:Competitors at the 2019 African Games Category:French male tennis players
